p: No previous studies reported the activity of EOs from Mentha spp. on α-amylase in association with phytotoxic activity. Figueroa-Pérez et al. [ 39] reported that M. piperita infusions showed a dose-dependent inhibitory activity of α-amylase with a maximum inhibition (45%) at a concentration of 60.0−80.0 mg/ mL.
